items.name: DJI Phantom 3 Advanced Quadcopter
items.categoryPath: Toys/Learning Toys/Science & Education
items.shortDescription: Bringing the Phantom line to the next generation, the Phantom 3 Advanced continues DJI's tradition of easy to fly, accessible flying cameras. With a 2.7K camera, live HD view and more, what will you create?

To learn more, please visit <a href="http://www.faa.gov/uas/registration/">www.faa.gov/uas/registration</a></b></p><p><br><b>DJI Phantom 3 Advanced Quadcopter:</b></p><ul><li>2.7K, 12 megapixel camera</li><li>Integrated 3-Axis stabilization gimbal</li><li>Easy-to-fly intelligent flight system</li><li>Live HD view</li></ul>

items.name: Air Hogs Star Wars Remote Control Millennium Falcon
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: <p>Bring the Star Wars universe to life with the Air Hogs Star Wars Remote-Control Millennium Falcon. Fly the most iconic ship in the Star Wars universe right in your own home. Four rotors concealed in the hull produce enough lift for agile space-like flight. You can charge your Air Hogs Millennium Falcon straight from the controller. Use the included USB cable to charge from a computer or phone charger to extend your battery life. Thanks to 2.4Ghz communication, you can control the falcon from up to 200' away. Relive the movie adventures with authentic sound effects and LED lights. The noise brings the Star Wars Millennium Falcon to life as you fly. Make up your own stunts, or use the Hyper-Drive button on the controller for a burst of light and sound that recreate a hyperspace flight. This Air Hogs Star Wars Remote-Control Millennium Falcon makes a great gift for a fan.</p>
items.longDescription: This Star Wars Millennium Falcon is made of durable impact-resistant foam, so you can fly your ship with confidence. The item also comes equipped with foam core ducts to protect the rotors, so minor crashes won't keep it grounded. Now Star Wars fans can join the Rebellion with a workable replica of the most iconic ship in the Star Wars universe. Star Wars products are produced by Spin Master under license from Lucasfilm Ltd. With the Air Hogs Star Wars Remote Control Millennium Falcon, you can take to the skies and let your imagination soar.<br><b><br>Millennium Falcon:</b><ul><li>Now you can fly the most iconic ship in the Star Wars universe: the Millennium Falcon Quad with iconic LED lights and authentic sounds</li><li>The Millennium Falcon uses 4 rotors concealed in the body of the ship for agile, space-like flight</li><li>Its 2.4Ghz communication lets you control the Millennium Falcon up to 200' away</li><li>Activates its hyper-drive stunt with the push of a button</li><li>The Star Wars Millennium Falcon is for star fighters aged 8+</li><li>6 x AA batteries required for operation</li><li>Air Hogs Millennium Falcon is for indoors and outdoors use</li><li>Includes: 1 Millennium Falcon quad, 1 remote control and 1 instruction guide</li></ul>

items.name: Swift Stream Z-9 Remote Control 12" Camera Drone, Black
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Record video and take photos flying inside or outside with this versatile drone, which displays footage right on your smartphone. This multifunction drone performs 360-degree flips, flies forward and backward and ascends and descends with ease via an included 2.4GHz transmitter, which is easy to use and read thanks to an LCD screen. Install the free app, available for Apple and Android devices, and start snapping still images and streaming video in real-time straight to your smartphone via the drone's built-in WiFi. It saves all of your photos and video on an included 2MB memory card. Equipped with eight built-in LED lights, this drone can fly safely even at night. It also works both indoors and outside, so you can get a bird's-eye view of your house or sneak a peek at your opponent's Scrabble tiles.<br>
items.longDescription: <strong>This product may require registration with the FAA prior to operation. To learn more, please visit <a href="http://www.faa.gov/uas/registration/">www.faa.gov/uas/registration</a></strong> <br><strong>Swift Stream Z-9 Remote Control 12" Camera Drone, Black:</strong><br><ul class="noindent"><li>Age Range: 14 years and up</li><li>5-channel control for aerial stunts</li><li>Flight time up to 7 minutes</li><li>Charge time up to 2 hours</li><li>Flight distance up to 200'</li><li>Record time up to 7 minutes</li><li>Easy to download app</li><li>Works with all smartphones</li><li>2.4GHz remote control</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li></ul><p><span>For any questions about parts, service, repairs or support please contact:</span><br></p><p><span>866-296-2700</span><br> </p>

items.name: RC 6 Axis Quadcopter Flying Drone Toy Gyro HD Camera Remote Control LED Lights
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.longDescription: Best Choice Products is proud to present this brand new White Drone. This helicopter is your entrance to a grand world of entertainment. The drone controller requires 4AA batteries (not included) to be able to fly. Once the drone is charged, and the controller has batteries, begin your flying journey through the skies! The drone contains 4 different propellers that allow it to ascend, descend, move forward, move in reverse, to the left, and to the right. As the drone ascends, it begins to flash red and blue lights that help identify the location of the drone. The best part of this drone is that it still has the capability to record videos and take pictures in high quality. Fly high, explore the skies, perform new tricks, and gain new perspectives through the usage of the drone. We purchase our products directly from the manufacturer, so you know you're getting the best prices available. <p><br><br>NEW PRODUCT WITH FACTORY PACKAGING</p><p><br></p><ul class="noindent"><li>Contains 6 axis gyro that allows the drone to ascend, descend, fly forward, reverse, left, and right and 360° roll over<br></li><li>Equipped with blue and red flashing LED lights that help identify the drone in the sky<br></li><li>Capable of recording videos and taking pictures (1280x720 Pixels) which are saved in its 2G memory<br></li><li>Drone includes 4 additional propellers, charger, memory card, card reader, protector shells, a controller, and a high capacity Lithium Ion battery<br></li><li>Controller requires 4AA batteries (not included)</li></ul><p><br><br>SPECIFICATIONS:</p><p><br></p><ul class="noindent"><li>Product Dimensions: 12"(L) x 12"(W) x 3"(H)<br></li><li>Shipping Dimensions: 20.5"(L) x 12"(W) x 3.5"(H)<br></li><li>Weight: 2 lbs.<br></li><li>Shipping Weight: 2.5 lbs</li></ul><p><br><br>PLEASE NOTE:</p><p><br></p><ul class="noindent"><li>Our digital images are as accurate as possible. However, different monitors may cause colors to vary slightly.<br></li><li>Some of our items are handcrafted and/or hand finished. Color can vary and slight imperfections in the metal work are normal and considered evidence of the hand-finishing process, which adds character and authenticity to those items.</li></ul>

Up to 10 minutes of continuous flying duration. Never lose track of your drone with built in multi-color LED lights for night flying. 300 ft range allowing endless possibilities for high performance maneuvering and flips. 2.4ghz remote control has anti-interference technology. Rechargeable high performance battery. Great for indoor and outdoor use. Includes: Drone, 4 Extra Propellers, 4GB Micro SD Card & Reader, USB Charging Cable, Manual. For ages 14+. Battery Included: Rechargeable Li-Ion

items.name: Air Hogs Axis 200 R/C Helicopter with Batteries, Red
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Fly right out of the box with the batteries already included! Ideal for new pilots, the Air Hogs Axis 200 2-channel indoor heli features four-directional control and a second stabilizer propeller to aid in steadier flight. Once you've mastered its flight, utilize the Center of Gravity shifter on the heli tail to increase flight aggression. The crash-resistant hard plastic frame stands up against tough crashes and comes with two replacement tail rotors. Learn to fly with the Air Hogs Axis 200 heli!
items.longDescription: <br><b>Air Hogs Axis 200 R/C Helicopter with Batteries, Red:</b><ul><li>The Axis 200 lets you learn the basics of RC flight with a simple and intuitive control system that will have you flying like an expert in no time; fly right out of the box</li><li>The Axis 200 comes with high quality Rayovak Fusion batteries for extra long flight times</li><li>The Axis 200's fly bar helps deliver inflight rotor stability for smooth and stable handling</li><li>The Axis 200 is made for pilots ages 8+ and includes 4 AA batteries to power the controller/charger</li><li>Includes: 1 Air Hogs Axis 200 Indoor R/C helicopter, 1 controller/charger with charging cable and storage, 2 spare tail rotors, 1 rotor removal tool, 4 AA batteries and 1 user instruction guide</li></ul>

items.name: X118 6-Axis Remote Control 2.4GHz Quadcopter Camera Drone with 1GB MicroSD Card
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.longDescription: The X118 quadcopter comes with a built it camera that allows you to record video or take still images for unsurpassed fun. Capture your friends and family from aerial view shots and see the world from a whole new angle. 6 channel function provide stable flying and easy operation that even lets you do 360 degree rotations and tricks. A built in rechargeable battery lets you have non stop fun without having to swap out batteries. USB cable makes charging more convenient so you can charge from any USB port. You can even fly at night with the LEDs that surround the edge of the quadcopter for nighttime fun.<br><br>Features<br>White with gray, gold and black accents<br>6-Channel Remote Control Rotor Quadcopter (7.5-inch design)<br>Built-in video camera to fly and capture videos and photos up high<br>Includes 1 GB microSD card for camera to download recorded content and share with family and friends<br>6-channel remote control<br>6-axis gyro flight control<br>2.4 GHz wireless technology<br>3D rolling, 360 degree rotation (Flip function!)<br>3.7V,850mAh Li-ion rechargeable battery<br>Battery charges via USB (USB cable included)<br>Blue, Red and Green LED Lights<br>Ideal for outdoor flying<br>Two extra rotor blades included<br>Remote control powered by four (4) AA batteries (not included)<br>Flight time: About 5.5 - 6 minutes<br>Charging time: About 150 minutes<br>Remote control distance: About 80m -100m / 262-ft - 328-ft<br><br>Remote Control Features:<br>Antenna<br>Photo button<br>Video control<br>Turn control<br>Speed button<br>Power indicator<br>Ascend/Descend stick<br>Forward/Backward/Left/Right sideways fly stick<br>Left/Right turn light control<br>Forward/Backward trimming<br>Left/Right turn trimming<br>Left/Right sideways fly trimming<br>LCD display<br><br>Quadcopter Dimensions:<br>4 x 7.5 x 7.5-inches (H x W x D, approximate)<br><br>Remote Control Dimensions:<br>7.5 x 6 x 2-inches (H x W x D, approximate)<br><br>Package Includes:<br>X118 6-Channel 2.4GHz 6-Axis Gyro Explorer Quadcopter<br>1GB microSD memory card<br>microSD to USB card reader<br>USB charging cable<br>Instruction Manual<br>Remote Control<br>Two (2) Extra rotor blades<br>Two (2) Stands<br>Four (4) Frame Protectors<br>Mini Screwdriver

items.shortDescription: Record anywhere you fly as you capture video from high above the ground with the Air Hogs Altitude Video Drone. The Video Drone is a 3-channel, gyro-stabilized heli with a built-in camera. The onboard memory instantly stores your aerial footage and photography. Engage in surveillance missions around your house or create your own movies with cool aerial footage. The Altitude Video Drone is built with crash-resistant materials designed to completely protect the onboard camera within its core. Capture crash-landing footage as you compile your Air Hogs premiere movie. Master and capture the skies with the high-performance Air Hogs Altitude Video Drone.

items.longDescription: <br><b>Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 Elite Edition:</b><ul><li>Apple iPad/iPhone/iPod or Android 2.2 (Froyo) and up device controls AR.Drone 2.0</li><li>AR.Freeflight used to fly and pilot the AR.Drone</li><li>Record pictures, navigation data and videos and upload them instantly from the application</li><li>720p/30fps/H.264 encoding base profile</li><li>Low-latency streaming</li><li>Video storage on the fly with remove device or with USB flash drive</li><li>JPEG photo capture</li><li>Director mode — easily programs AR.Drone 2.0 automatic flights to record shots</li><li>Flight recorder GPS improves stabilization and allows user to view their flights in 3D</li><li>Includes AR.Drone 2.0, indoor hull, outdoor hull, charger and 1000mAh battery</li><li>Color: sand</li></ul>

items.name: DJI Phantom 4 Advanced Quadcopter Drone FPV Virtual Reality Experience includes Drone, Virtual Reality Viewer, Intelligent Flight Battery, Propeller Guards and 32GB microSDHC Memory Card
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.longDescription: ; Avoid obstacles automatically. Track moving subjects automatically using ActiveTrack. TapFly lets you fly with a tap of the finger. Smart Return Home allows the Phantom to avoid obstacles as it returns home. 28 minute maximum fight time, maximum control range of 3.1mi (5km). Maximum speed of 44mph (72kmh). Integrated gimbal for greater camera stability and smoother footage. Optimized Vision Positioning System raises positioning altitude up to 10 meters. AIRCRAFT ; Revolutionary Materials and Refined Aerodynamics - A new, specially designed, magnesium core increases the stiffness and rigidity of the Phantom 4 without compromising weight. Working in tandem with the battery, it lifts the center of gravity closer to the level of the props which increases agility and responsiveness. This is all placed within a sleek and aerodynamically efficient shell. Multiple Flight Modes - Switching flight modes to meet your needs, whether you are looking for simplicity and intelligent navigation, speed or smooth cinematic movements is easy. Fly Far for Longer - Fly for 28 minutes, an increase in effective flight time of 25% from the Phantom 3 Professional. Enjoy 3.1mi (5km) of range, with complete control and a live 720p HD view of everything the camera sees. ; VISION ; Sense and Avoid - Front obstacle sensors combine with advanced computer vision and processing to give the Phantom active obstacle avoidance that allows it to react to and avoid obstacles in its path. Additionally, DJI's Vision Positioning System has been refined, increasing its effective altitude by over 300% from the Phantom 3's altitude to 10 meters and sharpening up its positioning capabilities, allowing for greater security and confidence when flying indoors. TapFly - The Phantom 4 reacts to your touch. In TapFly mode, simply tap on the live view on your smart device screen to send it flying in that direction. With Obstacle Sensing Systems you can watch it fly without worry. ActiveTrack - Using ActiveT

items.name: Air Hogs RC Rollercopter, Blue/Silver
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Roll anywhere! Obstacles and gravity are no barrier for the ground-to-air RC Air Hogs Rollercopter! With its exterior rolling cage, pilots can drive across the ground, roll up walls, fly through the air or even roll across the ceiling! The cage also acts as a durable shield, protecting your heli from walls or other obstacles and preventing unforeseen crashes. It's a ground and air RC Heli made for non-stop action! The Air Hogs Rollercopter — roll anywhere!
items.longDescription: <br><b>Air Hogs RC Rollercopter, Blue/Silver:</b><ul><li>Roll anywhere</li><li>At lower power, Rollercopter will drive across the ground in its rolling cage</li><li>Throttle up to max power to take to the air and fly</li><li>With its exterior rolling cage, you can roll it on the ground, up walls and even across the ceiling</li><li>Rollercopter's durable rolling cage also acts as a protective shield, allowing it to bump into walls or objects without damage or crashing</li><li>The Air Hogs Rollercopter is made for pilots ages 8+ and requires 6 AA batteries to power the controller/charger</li><li>Includes: 1 Air Hogs Rollercopter indoor RC helicopter, 1 Controller/Charger, 1 Instruction Sheet</li></ul><br><b>Questions about product recalls?</b><br>Items that are a part of a recall are removed from the Walmart.com site, and are no longer available for purchase. These items include Walmart.com items only, not those of Marketplace sellers. Customers who have purchased a recalled item will be notified by email or by letter sent to the address given at the time of purchase. For complete recall information, go to <a href="http://walmartstores.com/Recalls/" target="_blank">Walmart Recalls</a>.

This quality unit features a durable black matte finish. It will protect your equipment from bumps and scratches. The lockable latches will give you the peace of mind that everything is secured tightly as you transport it from one place to another. This DJI Phantom carry case has a pre-cut foam insert that protects your drone, controller, batteries and accessories from exposure and damage. It will safeguard your drone with its rugged and durable design to give you the confidence that it's securely stored for travel wherever you go. It is backed with U.S. support and service. This DJI Phantom case is made from high-quality materials throughout and has an easy carry handle. It features a black and silver color for a distinctive look.

items.name: Swift Stream S-208 Remote Control 9" Helicopter Super Cobra
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: This awesome 3.5-channel RC helicopter comes ready to fly! It can be easily controlled in all directions — fly forward, backward, up down, left, right and hover! A built-in gyroscope automatically stabilizes the helicopter during flight. It offers built-in auto pilot and an infrared remote control. It features an eight-minute flight time and works over up to 40-foot distances.
items.longDescription: <strong>Swift Stream S-208 Remote Control 9" Helicopter Super Cobra:</strong><br><ul class="noindent"><li>Age Range: 12 years and up</li><li>Flight time up to 8 minutes</li><li>Flight distance up to 40'</li><li>Charge time up to 60 minutes</li><li>Built-in LED search light</li><li>Charge from remote control</li><li>Built-in auto pilot</li><li>3.5 channels</li><li>Calibration trim control</li><li>Includes spare bladesRemote control uses 6 AA batteries (not included)</li></ul><p><span>For any questions about parts, service, repairs or support please contact:</span><br></p><p><span>866-296-2700</span><br> </p>

items.name: DJI PHANTOM 3 4K QUADCOPTER
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Be your own director and tell your story as never before. Reach for the sky and capture professional-quality footage from a new perspective. With a crystal-clear camera, real-time HD video display, and intuitive flight controls, what will you create? Phantom 3 4K Features 4K Video / 12 Megapixel Camera Wi-Fi Video Downlink Maximum Transmission Distance of 0.75mi (1.2km) Easy to Fly, Intelligent Flight System 3-Axis Stabilization Gimbal Dedicated Remote Controller GPS & Vision Positioning System Fly up to 25 Minutes on a Single Charge DJI GO App Epic Aerial Video With the Phantom 3 4K, you're shooting 4K video at up to 30 frames per second and capturing 12 megapixel photos that look crisper and cleaner than ever. Built-in Wi-Fi, 3/4-Mile Range Linking your mobile device to your Phantom through the DJI GO app is easy with an enhanced Wi-Fi range extender that's built right into the remote controller. A high-powered 5.8GHz transmission frequency keeps the Phantom responsive, ...
items.longDescription: DJI Phantom 3 4K Advanced Quadcopter Drone with 4K Camera and 3-Axis Gimbal ; Includes: [Aircraft Body Remote Controller Propeller Pair x 4 Intelligent Flight Battery Battery Charger Power Cable Gimbal Clamp Vibration Absorber x 4 16GB MicroSD Card Micro USB Cable Anti-drop Kit x 2 Landing Pad x 4 Propeller Removal Clamp Stick x 5 (Gold, Silver, Red, Blue, Pink) Manuals] Be your own director and tell your story as never before. Reach for the sky and capture professional-quality footage from a new perspective. With a crystal-clear camera, real-time HD video display, and intuitive flight controls, what will you create? Phantom 3 4K Features 4K Video / 12 Megapixel Camera Wi-Fi Video Downlink Maximum Transmission Distance of 0.75mi (1.2km) Easy to Fly, Intelligent Flight System 3-Axis Stabilization Gimbal Dedicated Remote Controller GPS & Vision Positioning System Fly up to 25 Minutes on a Single Charge DJI GO App Epic Aerial Video With the Phantom 3 4K, you're shooting 4K video at up to 30 frames per second and capturing 12 megapixel photos that look crisper and cleaner than ever. Built-in Wi-Fi, 3/4-Mile Range Linking your mobile device to your Phantom through the DJI GO app is easy with an enhanced Wi-Fi range extender that's built right into the remote controller. A high-powered 5.8GHz transmission frequency keeps the Phantom responsive, even when flying at distances of up to 0.75mi (1.2km) away.* *Maximum flight distance may vary with environmental conditions and local regulations. 3-Axis Stabilization Gimbal With DJI's industry-standard gimbal stabilization technology, your camera is help perfectly stable no matter how you fly. This 3-axis gimbal makes complex shots and hovering for long exposure photos easy. Easy to Fly Your Phantom 3 4K fits into your life and makes flying remarkably intuitive and easy. From takeoff to landing, it's completely under your control, responding to your commands while automatically handling the most complex aspects of safe, stable flight. Safety Features A unique Beginner Mode helps you learn how to fly in a safe, limited area. Your Phantom 3 4K can be set to fly only within a given distance and altitude from you, protecting your Phantom and making it automatically stay inside your desired limits. Worry-Free Autopilot Automatic elements of your Phantom 3 4K's intelligent flight system help you fly and are available at the touch of a button. Auto-Takeoff: With one tap in the DJI GO app, your Phantom 3 will turn on its motors and rise to a pre-set height. It will then hover perfectly in place until you direct it where to go. Auto-Return Home: When GPS is available, your Phantom 3 remembers the exact spot that it took off from. Wherever your aircraft is flying, tap a button to have it return right back home. Failsafe: If the intelligent Flight Battery is running low, or if your Phantom 3 loses the connection with your remote controller for any reason, the aircraft will automatically return to the takeoff point and land safely. Vision Positioning for Indoor Flight Fly indoors, low to the ground, and in GPS-free areas with Vision Positioning technology. Visual and ultrasonic sensors scan the ground beneath your Phantom 3 4K for patterns, enabling it to identify its position and move accurately. Powerful Mobile App Complete power is at your fingertips. Control the camera and change flight settings, all from your mobile device. Plus: Compatible with most DJI products Instant video downloading Easy video editor Comprehensive media library Sharing and connecting creativity Live map and radar Detailed records and achievements Manage your DJI account More Flying, More Fun Fly up to 25 minutes on a single charge. The patented DJI Intelligent Flight Battery continuously tells you exactly how long you can continue flying, based on how far and at what altitude you are, and it alerts you when it's time to head back. This information is treamed live to the GO app on your mobile dev ...

items.name: Air Hogs Helix Race Drone 2.4GHz RC Vehicle, Red
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.longDescription: This product may require registration with the FAA prior to operation. To learn more, please visit www.faa.gov/uas/registrationAir Hogs Helix Race Drone 2.4GHz RC Vehicle, Red:Quick-stunt button and crash-resistant exoframe technology allow you to push the limits2.4GHz remote communication provides high-performance, responsive controlsSuper stable flight in both Beginner and Advanced modesHelix Race Drone is for indoor and outdoor use and requires 6 AA batteries (batteries not included)Includes: 1 Helix Race Drone, 1 controller/charger, 1 USB charging cable, 1 instruction guideAge range: 8 years and up

items.name: Proto-Z Quadcopter Drone
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Joining the Drone lineup, is the brand new Proto-Z! Designed with the "beginner pilot" in mind, the Proto-Z is guaranteed hours of fun! Bright, built-in LEDs, one-button flip, true direction flight and a fast charge time makes this the ideal Drone for indoor flying! A 2.4GHz radio not only allows for interference-free flight but also allows for multiple Proto-Z's to fly at once. A 3.7V 100mAh LiPo battery, USB charge cord and spare rotor blades are also included in the ready-to-fly package. All you need to add are two "AAA" batteries!
items.longDescription: <p><b>This product may require registration with the FAA prior to operation. To learn more, please visit <a href="http://www.faa.gov/uas/registration/">www.faa.gov/uas/registration</a></b></p><p><br><b>Proto-Z Quadcopter Drone:</b></p><ul><li>Indoor use</li><li>Beginner friendly mini quadcopter offers low flying speed for easy flying</li><li>Flip function allows turns to the right and the left for exciting action</li><li>Headless function means it is simpler to control no matter what the quadcopter's orientation</li><li>Fly with friends</li><li>The 4-channel 2.4GHz frequency hopping controller allows up to 8 helicopters to fly simultaneously</li><li>110 MAH 1S LiPo battery holds more power providing longer flight times</li><li>Easily recharged from the USB port with charge protection, which prevents against accidental overcharging</li><li>82' range</li></ul>
